thread.title: Polls Close In Greece's Crucial EU Referendum
thread.title_full: Polls Close In Greece's Crucial EU Referendum

title: Polls Close In Greece's Crucial EU Referendum
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Sun, Jul 5, 2015, 17:19 BST - UK Markets closed Polls Close In Greece's Crucial EU Referendum By (c) Sky News 2015 | Sky News – 6 minutes ago View Photo 

Polls have closed in Greece's crucial bailout referendum - which could ultimately decide whether the country leaves the eurozone. 
All indications are suggesting the "Yes" and "No" camps are neck-and-neck, with just 3% or 4% between them. 
Six TV stations are predicting a narrow victory for the No campaign. 
Sky (Other OTC: BSYBF - news ) 's Economics Editor Ed Conway said if the exit polls prove true it is a "pretty clear statement" from the Greek people that they do not want austerity. 
Earlier, Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras said a No vote would allow his government to push for a better bailout package from its creditors. 
He strongly indicated he would step down if the Greek people backed the terms offered by the EU, the IMF and the European Central Bank by voting Yes. 
More follows...
